verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me again, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> mean ye, that <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H4911>use<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> sour <S%H1155>grapes,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are set on <S%H6949>edge?<s%>

As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> ye shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> occasion any <S%H5750>more<s%> to <S%H4911>use<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%> are mine; as the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1>father,<s%> so also the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> is mine: the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H2398>sinneth,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
But <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6662>just,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%>

And hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H5079>menstruous<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%>

And hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any,<s%> but hath <S%H7725>restored<s%> to the <S%H2326>debtor<s%> his <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> by <S%H1500>violence,<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment;<s%>

He that hath <S%H3808>not<s%> given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> any <S%H8636>increase,<s%> that hath <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>iniquity,<s%> <S%H5766><s%> hath <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H376>man,<s%>

Hath <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and hath <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H571>truly;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6662>just,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H2421><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

If he <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> that is a <S%H6530>robber,<s%> a <S%H8210>shedder<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> the <S%H251>like<s%> to any <S%H4480>one<s%> <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480>these<s%> <S%H428><s%> things,

And <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> duties, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> hath <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%>

Hath <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence,<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> and hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> hath <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination,<s%>

Hath given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury,<s%> and hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H8636>increase:<s%> shall he then <S%H2421>live?<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live:<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> he shall surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H4191><s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> upon him.

Now, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> if he <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> that <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H7200>considereth,<s%> and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> such like,

That hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> hath <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any,<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2254>withheld<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence,<s%> but hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment,<s%>

That hath taken <S%H7725>off<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4480>poor,<s%> <S%H6041><s%> that hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> nor <S%H8636>increase,<s%> hath <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> hath <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H2421><s%>

As for his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he cruelly <S%H6231>oppressed,<s%> <S%H6233><s%> <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> by <S%H1499>violence,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> even he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Yet <S%H559>say<s%> ye, <S%H4069>Why?<s%> doth <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father?<s%> When the <S%H1121>son<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> and hath <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and hath <S%H6213>done<s%> them, he shall surely <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H2421><s%>

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H2398>sinneth,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%> The <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1121>son:<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H2421><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>committed,<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> unto him: in his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Have I any pleasure at <S%H2654>all<s%> <S%H2654><s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> should <S%H4194>die?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> that he should <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H4480>ways,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H2421>live?<s%>

But when the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H4480>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6666><s%> and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H6213>doeth,<s%> shall he <S%H2421>live?<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2142>mentioned:<s%> in his <S%H4604>trespass<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H4603>trespassed,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> in them shall he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Yet ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> Is <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8505>equal?<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3808>unequal?<s%> <S%H8505><s%>

When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H4480>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6666><s%> and <S%H6213>committeth<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H4191>dieth<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> them; for his <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Again, when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H4480>wickedness<s%> <S%H7564><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>committed,<s%> and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall save his soul <S%H2421>alive.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%>

Because he <S%H7200>considereth,<s%> and turneth <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>committed,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H2421><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Yet <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal.<s%> <S%H3808><s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>equal?<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3808>unequal?<s%> <S%H8505><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%> <S%H7725>Repent,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> so <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H4383>ruin.<s%>

Cast <S%H7993>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> ye have <S%H6586>transgressed;<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> will ye <S%H4191>die,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of him that <S%H4191>dieth,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> wherefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves, and <S%H2421>live<s%> ye.
